Ryan Impey

Software Developer

  • Maintaining broadband products for millions of customers across the UK, whilst improving the onboard telemetry application to provide richer information for data analysis teams

  • Responsible for creating new development pipelines, improving our unit test setup, and allowing automation of internal documentation across multiple products

Full Stack Developer

Element Softworks | June 2018 - September 2019

  • Utilising agile methodologies and development sprints to complete large development tasks and provide continuous revisions/updates that clients could interact with and present
